time.description: An ISO 8601 compatible date/time stamp in UTC of the time the event occurred

nonce.description: Check value on uniqueness of an event

k.description: An access key, public API key, project key, id, etc.

author.description: Name of the author or artist of the media

client.description: Unique identifier or name of the client or media player

currentTime.description: Current time of the client/user in media playback in seconds

duration.description: Length of in media in seconds

explicit.description: If true, the media contains explicit content

loop.description: Indication of if the media is set to loop on the end of playback

muted.description: Indication of if the media is muted

networkState.description: An integer in the set of 0-3 that indicates the current network state

paused.description: Indication of if the media is paused

playbackRate.description: A number like 1 or 1.5 that indicates the relative speed of playback of the media

publisher.description: Name of the publisher of the media

readyState.description: An integer in the set of 0-4 that indicates the current media readiness state for playback

user_id.description: Unique identifier for the user performing the action

volume.description: A number between 0 and 1 (where 0 = 0% and 1 = 100%) that indicates the volume setting of the media
